Name: Minnesota Tribe
Details: One of the Second Succession War unsolved mysteries, at the beginning of the was there were rumores of a mysterious Deep Periphery group that had appeared in in a series of raids against border worlds of the Draconis Combine. Rumored to be a part of the army that followed General Kerensky into the Exodus, the raiders jumped back to the Periphery after raiding a number of worlds and were never seen again. The paranoia caused by the attacks accelerated the Draconis Combine's preparations for the Second Succession War, setting off another round of widespread destruction and death in the Inner Sphere.
